12. The wireless network system recited in claim 9, wherein at least one of the one or more classifications of data usage is based on a network type of the wireless access network.

13. The wireless network system recited in claim 8, wherein the one or more processors are further configured to communicate over the secure control link with the one or more device agents to assist the one or more device agents to provide, through the user interface of the end-user device, the estimated, projected, predicted, or expected measure of usage of the wireless access network by the end-user device before communicating over the secure control link with the one or more device agents to assist the one or more device agents to change the at least an aspect of a service plan associated with the end-user device.

14. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein at least one of the one or more device agents comprises software, and wherein the one or more processors are further configured to provide at least a portion of the software to the end-user device.

15. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein the information about a past or current service usage by the end-user device comprises a measure of past or current usage of the wireless access network by the end-user device.
16. The wireless network system recited in claim 7, wherein the catalog of one or more available service plan options includes a listing of one or more available service plans.
17. The wireless network system recited in claim 7, wherein the catalog of one or more available service plan options is based on a credential of the end-user device.

18. The wireless network system recited in claim 7, wherein the service plan is a first service plan, and wherein the catalog of one or more available service plan options includes an option to purchase a second service plan.

19. The wireless network system recited in claim 7, wherein the service plan is a first service plan, and wherein the catalog of one or more available service plan options includes an option to select a second service plan.

20. The wireless network system recited in claim 7, wherein the one or more processors are further configured to provide the catalog of one or more available service plan options to the one or more device agents.

21. The wireless network system recited in claim 7, wherein the one or more processors are further configured to obtain the catalog of one or more available service plan options from one or more network elements.

22. The wireless network system recited in claim 7, wherein the one or more processors are further configured to obtain a user response from the one or more device agents, the user response indicating a selection of one of the one or more available service plan options.

23. The wireless network system recited in claim 22, wherein the one or more processors are further configured to send a confirmation to the one or more device agents, the confirmation configured to assist the one or more device agents in presenting a service plan confirmation message through the user interface of the end-user device.
24. The wireless network system recited in claim 22, wherein the one or more processors are further configured to assist in provisioning one or more network elements based on the user response.

25. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein the information about a past or current service usage by the end-user device comprises a measure of past or current usage of the service plan associated with the end-user device.

26. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein the information about a past or current service usage by the end-user device comprises a percentage of usage of the service plan associated with the end-user device.
27. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein at least one of the one or more device agents comprises software.

28. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein assist the one or more device agents to change at least an aspect of a service plan associated with the end-user device comprises: provide one or more service plan options to the one or more device agents, and receive a service plan option selection from the one or more device agents, the service plan option selection indicating at least one of the one or more service plan options.

29. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein assist the one or more device agents to change at least an aspect of a service plan associated with the end-user device comprises: receive, from the one or more device agents, a service selection information request.

30. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein assist the one or more device agents to change at least an aspect of a service plan associated with the end-user device comprises: receive, from the one or more device agents, a service selection information request, provide one or more service plan options to the one or more device agents, and receive a service plan option selection from the one or more device agents, the service plan option selection indicating at least one of the one or more service plan options.
31. The wireless network system recited in claim 30, wherein the service selection information request comprises a device credential.
32. The wireless network system recited in claim 1, wherein the information about a past or current service usage by the end-user device comprises one or more classifications of data usage.
33. The wireless network system recited in claim 32, wherein at least one of the one or more classifications of data usage is based on a network destination accessible to the end-user device.
34. The wireless network system recited in claim 32, wherein at least one of the one or more classifications of data usage is based on an application on or available to the end-user device.
35. The wireless network system recited in claim 32, wherein at least one of the one or more classifications of data usage is based on a network type of the wireless access network.
